amendment.description: An amendment numbered 66 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to ensure that none of the funds made available by this bill will go towards funding a rule that will ban flavored milk.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tiffany amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tiffany amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tiffany amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
